nodes.text: Dragonsnake Bog was a swampy lagoon on the planet of Dagobah, in the Outer Rim Territories. The bog was located near Jedi Master Yoda's mud hut.

Upon his arrival at Dagobah following the Battle of Hoth, Luke Skywalker crash-landed his X-wing in Dragonsnake Bog. R2-D2 plunged into the water, and was almost devoured by a dragonsnake that resided under the murky waters - one of the largest known to have lived on Dagobah. Finding the astromech inedible, the creature spat the droid out into the jungle.
